name: Spearfishing Carnage
description:
The demons are coming, and you better be prepared. Exterminate fish, collect golden crabs to afford powerful weaponry and try to survive in the deep dark waters.

Short horror fps shooter made in 1 month for the HPS1 Summer of Shivers game jam.

Controls:

Switching weapons: 1, 2

Movement: WASD, Ctrl, Space

Shooting: LMB, R

Thanks to Pavlussuk (good friend) for providing some of the icons, models and audio.

You need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the downloaded game files.  Find and open the extracted folder and run the .exe file inside.
